description:
Rhizogrid guided molecular root imaging workflow enables investigating root rhizosphere interactions in a near native
environment. Non-invasive root images are captured, and three-dimensional root images are reconstructed using x-ray
computed tomography technique. Root and rhizosphere samples are then harvested and processed for root-rhizosphere
metabolite and microbial profiling.
name: Rhizogrids and 3D molecular root imaging workflow

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
